title: CHAPTER I. THE SERGEANT OF THE GUARDS.

book.title: The Prose Tales of Alexander Pushkin
book.description: 简介： My father, Andrei Petrovitch Grineff, after having served in his youth under Count Mnich,[1] quitted the service, in the year 17, with the rank of senior major. He settled down upon his estate in the district of Simbirsk, where he married Avdotia Vas...
